MS MCQs

    Introduction to Azure solutions

    »

    1. Artificial intelligence combined with Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can make AI real for your organization. Which of the following describes a scenario that uses AI to improve business outcomes?

      Strategically moving on-premises applications and workloads to the cloud

      The need to use both proprietary and open-source technologies across both public and private clouds

      Unlocking latent data with knowledge mining


    2. Azure provides unique value in four areas: Be Future Ready, Operate Hybrid Seamlessly, Trust your Cloud, and _____.

      Build on your Terms

      Integrated intelligence

      Most Compliant Platform


    3. What is the Microsoft solution that allows you to run your own copy of Azure within your datacenter, letting you build once and deploy seamlessly on-premises or to the cloud?

      Azure Cloud Services

      Azure Stack

      Azure Server


    4. Microsoft has support and coverage for certification and regulations worldwide. We cover certifications in the US Government, Industry, and what other areas?

      Regional and Global certification support

      EU Model Clauses

      All currently available certifications worldwide


    5. Build on your Terms is a unique value for Azure, what does that mean to your developers?

      IT sets policy for Azure development that all developers have to follow to publish solutions.

      Developers can build using the frameworks, languages, tools, and open-source software they want.

      More than 200 service and capabilities added to Azure in the last year, to support all developers needs.
